member.name: M:Browser.Types.CSSStyleSheet.replaceSync(System.String)
member.summary: synchronously replaces the content of the stylesheet with the content passed into it.
member.remarks: The replaceSync() and CSSStyleSheet.replace() methods can only be used on a stylesheet created with the CSSStyleSheet() constructor.

member.name: M:Browser.Types.CSSStyleSheet.replace(System.String)
member.summary: replaces the content of the stylesheet with the content passed into it. The method returns a promise that resolves with a CSSStyleSheet object.
member.remarks: The replaceSync() and CSSStyleSheet.replace() methods can only be used on a stylesheet created with the CSSStyleSheet() constructor.

member.name: M:Browser.CssExtensions.Document.set_styleSheets(Browser.Types.Document,Browser.Types.StyleSheetList)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of styleSheet objects representing the style sheets that correspond to each instance of a link or style object in the document.

member.name: M:Browser.CssExtensions.Document.get_styleSheets(Browser.Types.Document)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of styleSheet objects representing the style sheets that correspond to each instance of a link or style object in the document.

member.name: M:Browser.CssExtensions.Document.set_adoptedStyleSheets(Browser.Types.Document,Browser.Types.CSSStyleSheet[])
member.summary: returns this DocumentOrShadowRoot adopted stylesheets or sets them. https://wicg.github.io/construct-stylesheets/#using-constructed-stylesheets

member.name: M:Browser.CssExtensions.Document.get_adoptedStyleSheets(Browser.Types.Document)
member.summary: returns this DocumentOrShadowRoot adopted stylesheets or sets them. https://wicg.github.io/construct-stylesheets/#using-constructed-stylesheets

member.name: M:Browser.CssExtensions.ShadowRoot.get_styleSheets(Browser.Types.ShadowRoot)
member.summary: Returns a StyleSheetList of CSSStyleSheet objects for stylesheets explicitly linked into, or embedded in a shadow tree.

member.name: M:Browser.CssExtensions.Element.set_adoptedStyleSheets(Browser.Types.Element,Browser.Types.CSSStyleSheet[])
member.summary: returns this DocumentOrShadow adopted stylesheets or sets them. https://wicg.github.io/construct-stylesheets/#using-constructed-stylesheets

member.name: M:Browser.CssExtensions.Element.get_adoptedStyleSheets(Browser.Types.Element)
member.summary: returns this DocumentOrShadow adopted stylesheets or sets them. https://wicg.github.io/construct-stylesheets/#using-constructed-stylesheets
